title: I See Us Dancing
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Marks LRC, in pencil: [Micah]; LLC, in pencil: [I see us
description: nude woman reclining on PR; green background; green and white patterned cloth draped between the woman\'s legs; banner at top and bottom reads, \"In my mind I see us dancing, like autumn leaves gathered by the wind/the music touching me in special places...as you do/ from a poem by L.S.\"
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
